column4: does anyone knows a powerfull alternative to rythmbox, not so winamp like things as xmms or beep?
i know amarok, but works not good under gnome
then take a look at Listen
is listen available in the repos?
but i believe the website provides a repository location, i'll look it up
cant find anything about it in google
take a look at http://listengnome.free.fr/ it provides information, screenshots and a repository location for Dapper 6.06
isn't gdm used to start the gnome desktop?
thank you again, thats the thing ive searched for :D
no problem :D i am beginning to get interested in Listen myself atm :P
